synopsis.text: Gyuumaou's revival is imminent, threatening the delicate balance between humans and demons. The legendary Sanzo Ikkou, consisting of the powerful priest Genjo Sanzo, the formidable demons Son Goku, Sha Gojyo, and Cho Hakkai, embarks on a perilous journey westward to prevent the resurrection of this malevolent demon lord. Facing relentless adversaries and internal strife, the group must unite to overcome the challenges that lie ahead and restore peace to the world. As they traverse towards India, the Sanzo Party must confront Gyuumaou's son, Kougaiji, and other demonic foes who stand in their way. Can they put aside their differences and work together to stop the revival and save Shangri-la? Inspired by the real-life journey of a Buddhist monk in AD 629, this anime follows the Sanzo Ikkou on their epic quest to preserve harmony in a world on the brink of chaos.
